desenv: Python, HTML, CSS, C, and Java Developer
about-text: My name is Lucas César Lorena, I'm 26 years old and I live in Campinas, São Paulo. I'm a Computer Science student and passionate about technology and innovation, always seeking to learn and develop new skills. I have knowledge of Python, HTML, CSS, C and Java, and I have a degree in Mechatronics.
